(CGFloat) - radialOffsetForPieChart:recordIndex:
 Offsets the slice radially from the center point. Can be used to "explode" the chart.

Detailed Description

A pie chart data source.

Member Function Documentation

- (CGFloat) radialOffsetForPieChart: (CPPieChart *)  pieChart
recordIndex: (NSUInteger)  index 
[optional]

Offsets the slice radially from the center point. Can be used to "explode" the chart.

Parameters:
pieChart The pie chart.
index The data index of interest.
Returns:
The radial offset in view coordinates. Zero is no offset.
- (CPFill *) sliceFillForPieChart: (CPPieChart *)  pieChart
recordIndex: (NSUInteger)  index 
[optional]

Gets a fill for the given pie chart slice. This method is optional.

Parameters:
pieChart The pie chart.
index The data index of interest.
Returns:
The pie slice fill for the slice with the given index.
- (CPTextLayer *) sliceLabelForPieChart: (CPPieChart *)  pieChart
recordIndex: (NSUInteger)  index 
[optional]

Gets a label for the given pie chart slice. This method is no longer used.

Parameters:
pieChart The pie chart.
index The data index of interest.
Returns:
The pie slice label for the slice with the given index. If you return nil, the default pie slice label will be used. If you return an instance of NSNull, no label will be shown for the index in question.
Deprecated:
This method has been replaced by the CPPlotDataSource -dataLabelForPlot:recordIndex: method and is no longer used.
